## TemplateConfig interface

The exported `config` function's definition.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TemplateConfig
```

## Properties

| Property                                                | Modifiers | Type                                | Description                                                                                                       |
| ------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [name?](./sites-scripts.templateconfig.name.md)         |           | string                              | <i>(Optional)</i> The name of the template feature. If not defined uses the template filename (without extension) |
| [stream?](./sites-scripts.templateconfig.stream.md)     |           | [Stream](./sites-scripts.stream.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The stream configuration used by the template                                                   |
| [streamId?](./sites-scripts.templateconfig.streamid.md) |           | string                              | <i>(Optional)</i> The stream that this template uses. If a stream is defined the streamId is not required.        |
